Battery Memory HD Res Address Fps Record FPS Record Res Live FPS Live Res Camera is recording.Please stop it first Add Camera Before adding a camera, make sure your phone is connected to the same Wi-Fi network, follow below steps when you are ready. 1.Fill in the name and password of your Wi-Fi network on the dialog, tapping on OK to generate a QR code. 
2. Set your Drift camera into QR scanning mode by holding down the middle button until the front indicator light turns blue. 
3.Keep 20cm between camera and phone, when you hear scanning successful, leave camera alone and it will automatically finish the remaining process. Notes: 1. Make sure you input the proper Wi-Fi name and password, both are case sensitive. 
 2. Some Drift cameras only support 2.4G Wi-Fi. Should you have any questions, please consult Drift customer support team. s Wi-Fi name Wi-Fi password Please enter Wi-Fi password Record to Cam Record to Mobile Downloads Live Live URL: input live URL Send Successfully
Please enter room ID Room ID cannot exceed 18 characters Please enter numbers, letters or symbols @_- Please enter nickname Please enter Chinese, numbers, letters or symbols @_- Nickname cannot exceed 18 characters
